name: 2024 7th International Conference on Information, Networks and Communications
content: PUBLICATION: Submissions will be sent to at least two conference committee members for peer review. Accepted, registered, and presented papers will be included into Conference Proceedings and submitted to be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc.... Selected excellent papers will be recommended to Journal of Communications or Journal of Advances in Information Technology. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340 (Online)) indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus (Since 2020), CNKI, etc. Impact Factor 2022: 1.0 | CiteScore 2022: 3.1 Journal of Communications (ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print)) indexed by Scopus, DBLP, CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, etc. CiteScore 2022: 2.5
